summary: Test suite that validates the functionality of the Proof of Discrete Log Equivalence (PoDLE) commitment system used in the JoinMarket client, covering signature generation, commitment creation, retry logic, external commitment handling, verification of NUMS parameters, constructor behavior, error messaging, and random commitment scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and security of the PoDLE protocol within the JoinMarket mixing service by automatically checking that commitment generation, verification, and error handling work correctly, thereby supporting safe and private Bitcoin transactions.
